subject: Ratings and Rating Systems
Television
Basketball
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Twice this season, Nextel Cup rainouts on Fox, where nothing happened and no points were won, trounced N.B.A. games on ABC Sports.
